content: Pro !Great App to use with SpotWalla! Just did a 1000-mile 24-hour motorcycle ride where I had to log all my stops and this one that did it perfectly! Thank you!
replyContent: Congratulations! Be proud of your accomplishment.

content: I am new to bubbler & struggled with understanding its full features and capabilities? Sent a email off for help? Gotta say....great customer service! Joel broke down some of my confusion! Cool app, very happy with the purchase! Keep up the great work!
Plays up sometimes
Great app
Loved Bubbler when it could send SMS, now I only like it... please bring it back if possible.
replyContent: I'm sorry for the impact to you. We are unhappy about it as well. Google mandated SMS be removed from the app, or they would remove the app entirely from the store. They had an appeal process but declined all developers  who appealed, us included, and we sent several appeals.

content: The interface is a bit ho-hum, but the app does exactly what I need it to do. I am having a problem with is starting automatically after a reboot. Otherwise, it's great.
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback. A couple items to note. Zoom can be accomplished by utilizing the volume +/- buttons on the side of most phones. Picture resolution is intentionally low for 2 reasons. 1. Storage space impact to SpotWalla.com. 2. Images are downsampled to use less data, and has a higher probability of completing I'm a timely manner.

content: Works very well. I use it with Spotwalla in Australia and recently on a trip in Japan. üëç
when i go on long motorcycle rides it keep my wife happy to know im alive and still moving
this our a bloody great app. I have only one issue. I can never stop it. nothing happens when the stop is pushed. apart from that it's great.
replyContent: Thank you for your review. The stop button ends tracking on the device. It indicates this by removing the app icon from the top of your screen. If the icon is there, it's tracking. If it is not there it is not tracking.

content: works well for many years

Excellent app, however I won't be doing the update anytime soon. I use the SMS capabilities and will put off the upgrade as long as possible. Might I suggest using an alternative source to get the full version instead of using a crippled version through the play store.
replyContent: Thank you for the review. We don't agree with the play store decision to remove users ability to use their phones how they wish, but there's little we can do about it at this time.

content: Better than paying for something stupid like SPOT and InReach for 99.9999% of us.
Outstanding product. Does exactly what it is supposed to do with VERY little overhead or data usage.
I've been using it for a while now and it always just works!
Works good but no visual on off

DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP It Is USELESS. I installed this app, and it work one day before it stopped working. There is little or no customer support, for the or Spot Walla. Google will not refund your money.. This is a a rip off.
replyContent: I'm sorry this did not meet your needs.  I did respond to your email within 9 minutes, on a Sunday evening, with no further response other than this review.  Should you be interested in resolving your issues, I would be happy to do so.

content:
Works great on my Samsung A5 (2017) and HTC Desire. Setup was a bit of a 
challenge but help was available from Spotwalla and Bubbler websites.

Not sure how well it is going to be, was working fine then all of a sudden it quit working, uninstall and reinstall and is doing the same thing, hit the open button then gives error message and then asks if I called ???

I paid for this app a few versions back and needed to use it again recently. I downloaded the most recent version and cannot get it to perform correctly...regardless of the instructions.  I am using the same phone as before and am very disappointed. I have gone through the settings 6 times to no avail. It has been uninstalled too many times to mention and my phone restarted as many times. My local bike club wanted to use this but after all the problems,  I cannot recommend it to them. Sorry
replyContent: I'd be happy to help resolve your issues. Please explain what the problem is that you are having and contact me with that information at bubblergps@gmail.com.

content: Wish I could up camera resolution just a tad, but it works well

Learned of Bubbler from a moto forum, strted with the free version. Once set up, it's been flawless. Upgraded (willingly) to the paid version, and more than got my money's worth on a multi day road trip, able to keep the family updated with where we were and share some of the sights.

Simple but effective application. I like simple. I've used it on a few trips so my wife would know I was ok. I did have a minor problem this past week and the developer was very responsive and quick to help.

Great app, and great developer.   I have a Nexus 5X and there is one small issue with the camera on this phone.  In the design of the 5X, the CMOS sensor had to be mounted upside down.  This causes the pics taken within the app to appear upside down with this particular phone.   After an email to Joel, he explained he was aware of it, and while it could be fixed, it would break older phone compatibility.  I loved the down to earth honesty of the developer.   For this phone, an easy workaround is turn the phone 90¬∞ clockwise to landscape mode to take the pic.

Easy to use and a great value compared to Spot.  The ability to add a picture and text to points along the GPS track is outstanding.  Teamed up SpotWalla and it's a complete package for capturing you adventures.
Works flawlessly. Used it for a motorcycle trip around the country so my wife and daughter could see my progress. My only complaint is that the app is always running even if there is no active trip.
Brilliant app.  Works very well with Spotwalla.
Perfect, does what is says. Great for tracking the 4WD adventures.  Cheers.
I've enjoyed this app.  Great for tracking a motorcycle adventure and sharing it with family and friends.  It's also a great way to document an Iron Butt ride.
Best app I have ever purchased. Works great!
Excellent!
Using Bubbler and Spotwalla my family and friends were able to track my 23 day motorcycle trip from Tennessee to CA OR WA ID and back. Worked perfect!
Perfect tool that mates with spotwalla to track your motorcycle tour
Pay the extra ten bucks. This app rocks! I use it on a daily basis when riding my motorcycle and snowboarding.
I was looking at Spot trackers when I found this. A great idea with excellent tech support too.

Absolutely the best $10 I've ever spent. This app ranks up there with my 2009 Yamaha FJR 1300a, my sena BT headset and my Zumo GPS. Now I get to share my track in real time with family and friends. I can revisit my motorcycle trips at will.
Works a treat.
Plots my bubble tracks perfectly to my spotwalla account. Great app. Keep improving it :)

I ride a motorcycle every day and occasionally travel long distances. I have wanted a SPOT tracker but didn't want to spend a lot of money. I found this app and it does more than SPOT at a fraction of the price.  I haven't used it on a long distance trip yet, but over the past couple of days it has worked great. I bought the Pro version primarily for the email photos feature, I think that's a fantastic addition. My wife will benefit the most from this as she will be able to see where I am and know that I am

I purchased this to have a backup to my SPOT (two is one, one is none) plus I like the ability to send specific email messages. I used the app today on a round trip from Phx to Tucson and it worked just fine. I had a (user) issue in setting up the application and the developer was very responsive and helpful, and VERY quick in getting me my answers.  As a LD rider this will now be active on all my rides.  Highly recommended.

I travel by motorcycle and go out on rides.  My wife worries about me while I'm out and we've used latitude in the past for her to "Keep her eye" on me.  It brings her peace of mind which lets me keep riding so that works.  Latitude has been frustrating however due to the way it updates your location as it's not always consistent.  Showing where I was two hours ago isn't very helpful.  Bubbler fixes this by dropping breadcrumbs on the spotwalla map at regular intervals.  Granted, it's only live if you have a data connection but that is one of the very nice features of Bubbler is that it'll queue up points while you have no data and then drop them on the map later.  I just finished a two day 1500 mile trip that included a lot of time spent in rural NM where there was no cell coverage.  Every time I passed through coverage the map reliably updated with all data points in between.  It worked very well and I'll be using this app on all my future trips.

This app really leverages the already mega-groovy Spotwalla experience and is a must-have for anyone with a 'Droid.  Enough reason to ditch your iToy and get to traveling like a grown-up.  I used to use Spotwalla primarily for moto-bike fun, but now with Bubbilicious and it's tasty functionality I'll be Spotwallowing much more often.  Ask me if I have Bubbles. Yes, I have bubbles.  RenoJohn
